code: import*as actionTypes from"./actionTypes";export var addSort=function addSort(filter,filtered){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch(sortPostsStart());dispatch(sortPostsAdd(filter));dispatch(sortPosts(filtered));}catch(err){dispatch(sortPostsFail(err));}};};export var removeSort=function removeSort(filter,filtered){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch(sortPostsStart());dispatch(sortPostsRemove(filter));dispatch(sortPosts(filtered));}catch(err){dispatch(sortPostsFail(err));}};};export var sortPostsAdd=function sortPostsAdd(filter){return{type:actionTypes.SORT_POSTS_ADD,filter:filter};};export var sortPostsRemove=function sortPostsRemove(filter){return{type:actionTypes.SORT_POSTS_REMOVE,filter:filter};};export var sortPosts=function sortPosts(filtered){return{type:actionTypes.SORT_POSTS,filtered:filtered};};export var sortPostsStart=function sortPostsStart(){return{type:actionTypes.SORT_POSTS_START};};export var sortPostsFail=function sortPostsFail(error){return{type:actionTypes.SORT_POSTS_FAIL,error:error};};export var sortReset=function sortReset(){return{type:actionTypes.SORT_RESET};};
